detail_desc: Short, high-waisted shorts in a viscose weave with pleats at the top, wide elastication at the back of the waist, and side pockets.
Short skirt in a stretch weave with an asymmetric seam at the hem, diagonal flounce at the front and concealed zip at the back. Bonded jersey lining.
Short, high-waisted shorts in a patterned viscose weave with pleats at the top, wide elastication at the back of the waist, and side pockets.

Calf-length, patterned skirt in satin with a concealed zip at the back, slits in the sides and an asymmetric hem.
T-shirt in printed slub-cotton jersey with an open chest pocket and ribbed neckline.
Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, a hood, a zip down the front, and side pockets. Contrasting colour jersey trim around the hood, cuffs and hem.

Lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a print motif and appliqués. Stand-up collar, detachable, lined hood and zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Longer at the back. Quilted lining.
Knee-length, flared skirt in crinkled, patterned chiffon with a high waist, concealed zip in the side and tiered flounces. Lined.

Long dress in woven fabric in a narrow cut at the top with an opening at the front and short, narrow shoulder straps. Narrow elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt. Satin-lined bodice.

Long dress in woven fabric in a narrow cut at the top with an opening at the front and short, narrow shoulder straps. Narrow elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt. Satin-lined bodice.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a lightweight stretch cotton weave with a sheen. Elastication with decorative gathers at the shoulders and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with trumpet cuffs and ties. Unlined.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a lightweight stretch cotton weave with a sheen. Elastication with decorative gathers at the shoulders and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with trumpet cuffs and ties. Unlined.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a lightweight stretch cotton weave with a sheen. Elastication with decorative gathers at the shoulders and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with trumpet cuffs and ties. Unlined.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Small stand-up collar, a V-neck, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lining dress with narrow shoulder straps.
Sleeveless chiffon dress with an elasticated neckline with decorative gathers, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and smocking at the waist. Longer at the back. Satin lining.
Sleeveless chiffon dress with an elasticated neckline with decorative gathers, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and smocking at the waist. Longer at the back. Satin lining.
Trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with patch front pockets, one with a concealed zip and press-stud, and back pockets. Slim legs that flare at the hem with creases.
Trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with patch front pockets, one with a concealed zip and press-stud, and back pockets. Slim legs that flare at the hem with creases.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Fully lined, patterned bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways. Metal fastener at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print, large metal press-studs at the top, a racer back and high-cut legs.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Leather sandals with thin leather straps that tie around the ankle and decorative studs in the sides of the soles. Leather-covered heels, 4.5 cm.
A-line skirt in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated waist with ties at the front and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
A-line skirt in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated waist with ties at the front and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Clamdiggers in washed cotton with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit wool blend in a long, slightly wider style. Buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fancy dress gloves in soft printed fleece with padding at the top and appliqués. Polyester filling.

Calf-length dress in jacquard-weave viscose with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, shoulder pads and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and an asymmetric skirt. Lined.

Calf-length dress in airy, crinkled chiffon decorated with plastic beads. Round neck with an opening and button at the back, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs and a gently flared, tiered skirt. Short satin underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Knee-length pleated skirt in a patterned weave with a concealed zip in one side and asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front and short cap sleeves.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a straight-cut hem with rows of fringing and long slits in the sides.

Jumper in a soft, chunky knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
